name: dockerhost
label: dockerhost
description: Data structure describing connection details for a remote host VM capable of running Docker commands

attributes.name: docker_host
attributes.description: IP address or FQDN of remote host VM
attributes.label: Docker host

attributes.name: login_name
attributes.description: Login name for connecting to the remote host VM
attributes.label: Login name

attributes.name: private_key
attributes.description: SSH private key for login (Base64 encoded)
attributes.label: Private key
